name: Dove Soothing Caring Bath
composition: INGREDIENTS: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Acrylates Copolymer, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum, Glycol Distearate, Sodium Hydroxide, Glycol Stearate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 17200, CI 19140.
